```{r}
print("test")
games_csv <- read.csv("data.csv", header = T)
games_csv$Free <- games_csv$CurrentPrice == 0
plot(games_csv$meta_score, games_csv$stsp_owners, xlab = "Meta Score", ylab = "Steam Owners", main = "Meta Score vs Steam Owners")
```
```{r}

model.lm <- lm(log(stsp_owners) ~ meta_score + meta_uscore + full_price, data = games_csv)
summary(model.lm)
```
